Using Bonica's state level data
```{r data}
library(readstata13)
library(tidyverse)

# Get Bonica's state level data
d <- readstata13::read.dta13("BonicaStateLevel.dta")

## rename variables (Medians)
d %<>%
  rename(Governor = gov_cf) %>% 
  rename(Lower = l_cf_median) %>% 
  rename(Upper = u_cf_median)
```

As .png
```{r bonica-1-does-NOT-cross-0, fig.height = 4, fig.width = 3.5}
# fig 1 - Political Principals All Democrats OR Republicans (dist_1_x_zero == 0)
# states sorted by distance_1_gov_leg_med
d %>% 
  filter(dist_1_x_zero == 0) %>% 
  mutate(party = ifelse(dist_1_x_zero == 0 & Governor<0, "All Democrats", "All Republicans")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Governor, y = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med)), shape = "G", color = "black") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Lower, y = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med)), shape = "L", color = "purple") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Upper, y = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med)), shape = "U", color = "orange") + 
  labs(y = "", x = "", title = "Political Principals are All Democrats OR Republicans") + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(-1, 0, 1)) + 
  facet_grid(party ~ year, scales = "free_y", space = "free_y") + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 5), title = element_text(size = 7)) 

ggsave("Figs/bonica-1-does-NOT-cross-0.pdf", height = 4, width = 3.5)
```

```{r bonica-5-all-2004, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 3.1}
# fig 5 - All kinds Political Principals
# states sorted by distance_1_gov_leg_med
d %>% 
  filter(year == 2004, state != "NH") %>%
    mutate(party = ifelse(dist_1_x_zero == 0 & Governor < 0, "All Liberal", "Divided Government")) %>% 
  mutate(party = ifelse(dist_1_x_zero == 0 & Governor > 0, "All Conservative", party)) %>%
  mutate(party = ifelse(is.na(dist_1_x_zero) & Governor > 0, "All Conservative", party)) %>%
  mutate(Lower = Lower - .0000001) %>% 
  mutate(min = pmin(Governor, Lower, Upper), max = pmax(Governor, Lower, Upper) ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med))) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = min, xend = max, yend = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med)), color = "grey", size = 2.1, lineend = "round") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Governor, color = Governor), shape = "G") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Lower, color = Lower), shape = "L") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Upper, color = Upper), shape = "U") + 
  labs(y = "States by Preference Divergence", x = "Mean Ideology Score", title = "Preference Divergence of Political Principals, 2003", color = "") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(-1, 0, 1)) + 
  scale_colour_gradient2(low = "blue", mid = "purple", high = "red") +
  facet_grid(party ~ ., scales = "free_y", space = "free_y") + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 5), title = element_text(size = 7), legend.position = "none") 

ggsave("Figs/bonica-5-all-2004.pdf", height = 5, width = 3.1)
```
```{r bonica-5-all-2008, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 3.1}
# fig 5 - All kinds Political Principals
# states sorted by distance_1_gov_leg_med

d %>% 
  filter(year == 2008, state != "NE") %>%
  mutate(party = ifelse(dist_1_x_zero == 0 & Governor < 0, "All Liberal", "Divided Government")) %>% 
  mutate(party = ifelse(dist_1_x_zero == 0 & Governor > 0, "All Conservative", party)) %>%
  mutate(party = ifelse(is.na(dist_1_x_zero) & Governor > 0, "All Conservative", party)) %>%
  mutate(Lower = Lower - .0000001) %>% 
  mutate(Upper = Upper + .0000001) %>% 
  mutate(min = pmin(Governor, Lower, Upper, na.rm = T), max = pmax(Governor, Lower, Upper, na.rm = T) ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med))) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = min, xend = max, yend = reorder(state, distance_1_gov_leg_med)), color = "grey", size = 2.1, lineend = "round") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Governor, color = Governor), shape = "G") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Lower, color = Lower), shape = "L") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Upper, color = Upper), shape = "U") + 
  labs(y = "States by Preference Divergence", 
       x = "Mean Ideology Score", 
       title = "Preference Divergence of Political Principals, 2007", 
       color = "") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(-1, 0, 1)) + 
  scale_colour_gradient2(low = "blue", mid = "purple", high = "red") +
  facet_grid(party ~ ., scales = "free_y", space = "free_y") + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 5), title = element_text(size = 7), legend.position = "none") 

ggsave("Figs/bonica-5-all-2008.pdf", height = 5, width = 3.1)
```
